Talents.Name: The Chosen One
Talents.Description: Attacks have a 20% chance to hit twice; this chance increases by 5% for each ammo consumed while skill is active, resetting when the skill ends

Talents.Name: Empathy by Shotgun
Talents.Description: For every [Laterano] Operator deployed, increases the ammo capacity of ammo-based skills by +1 (stacks up to 4 times)
